page.title: 05SOCIAL LIFE
page.content: {Ceilidh:}Every year in March at the village halL, there is a Ceilidh.A Ceilidh is a Scottish party type gathering where we meet to dance and sing. The music is supplied by an accordian, fiddle, guitar and drums. We eat traditional food of shepherds pie and clootie dumpling. {Whist Drive:}At least once a year a Basket Whist Drive is held.Profits from the Ceilidh and Whist pay for the Childrens Christmas Party in December. {Glen Outing:}Every year in the Summer Holidays people of the Glen have an outing.We spend the whole day away taking a picnic lunch and we have tea at a resturaunt. There are no{Guides, Cubs, Brownies, {Scouts}or{Womens Rural Institute}in the glen so members have to travel to Cortachy for meetings.
